remarks: The value of the identity element.  (Contributed by FL, 12-Dec-2009.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 22-Dec-2013.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
idrval.1 $e |- X = ran G $.
idrval.2 $e |- U = ( GId ` G ) $.
idrval $p |- ( G e. A -> U = ( iota_ u e. X A. x e. X ( ( u G x ) = x /\ ( x G u ) = x ) ) ) $.
$d G u x $.
$d X u x $.
